Headline: No Trains Between Pulaski and LaSalle
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and LaSalle due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Pulaski and LaSalle due to a police investigation.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and LaSalle, and,
  • between Forest Park and Pulaski, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Pulaski and LaSalle to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.  This may include the #56 Milwaukee bus. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to  announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
